import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Apply bulk VAT"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/quotation/1/quotations/{quotationId}/applygroupvat"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This will set the `VatId` field for all lines that are
currently in the quotation group. This does not affect lines
that are added _after_ calling this endpoint.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"quotationId","in":"path","description":"The identifier of the quotation containing the group","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["quotationGroupIds"],"type":"object","properties":{"vatId":{"type":"string","description":"The identifier of the VAT to apply","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"quotationGroupIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The identifiers of the quotation groups that should be\r\nupdated"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"BulkQuotationGroupVatIdModel"}},"text/json":{"schema":{"required":["quotationGroupIds"],"type":"object","properties":{"vatId":{"type":"string","description":"The identifier of the VAT to apply","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"quotationGroupIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The identifiers of the quotation groups that should be\r\nupdated"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"BulkQuotationGroupVatIdModel"}},"application/*+json":{"schema":{"required":["quotationGroupIds"],"type":"object","properties":{"vatId":{"type":"string","description":"The identifier of the VAT to apply","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"quotationGroupIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The identifiers of the quotation groups that should be\r\nupdated"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"BulkQuotationGroupVatIdModel"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
